text: hey guys I'm chef Amanda Freitag and I
own Empire diner in New York City as a
chef of a diner I have to know a thing
or two about curing hangovers one of my
favorite hangover cures is a patty melt
oh my god it's a hamburger and a grilled
cheese all in one and you just get
greasy fatty yummy goodness and as soon
as you do you know young chef Amanda
when she was a line cook she liked to go
out and have some drinks going to the
diner was always the place to go for the
Cure and the patty melt that I make here
at the Empire diner is this combination
of everything I love its body
caramelized onion
Swiss cheese cheddar cheese rye bread
please did butter and this hangover cure
is not complete without front fries
I think the fat really absorbs all that
food the salt helps you keeping a little
bit of fluid that you have left and then
tastes damn good it's not to say that
I'm hungover today but a fatty Mountain
is good anytime I need to be alone with
my patty melt come on move out from a
blah blah don't forget to subscribe to
bone Appetit channel for more tips
tricks and hangover cures pros like me
